text: Léon Bogart (31 March 1889 - 6 April 1963) was a French gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1963 deaths Category:French male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Roubaix
title: Léon Bogart
